mapper.select: SELECT project.ID projectID, project.Name projectName, project.ProvinceID provinceID, project.PlacardPath placardPath, project.BackgroundPath backgroundPath, project.AssistantID assistantID, project.StartDate startDate, project.EndDate endDate, project.AdminID adminID, project.ID isVisible, project.IsActive isActive, project.HaveFarmer haveFarmer, project.Description description FROM PROJECT WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{projectName} AND ProvinceID=#{provinceID} AND ISACTIVE=1

SELECT project.ID projectID, project.Name projectName, project.ProvinceID provinceID, project.PlacardPath placardPath, project.BackgroundPath backgroundPath, project.AssistantID assistantID, project.StartDate startDate, project.EndDate endDate, project.AdminID adminID, project.ID isVisible, project.IsActive isActive, project.HaveFarmer haveFarmer, project.Description description FROM PROJECT WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{projectName} AND ProvinceID=#{provinceID} AND ISACTIVE=1 and HaveFarmer = 1
select * from retailer where provinceId=#{provinceId} and replace(chineseName,' ','')=#{retailerName}
SELECT R.* FROM RPROJECTRETAILER RPR INNER JOIN RETAILER R ON R.ID = RPR.RETAILERID WHERE RPR.PROJECTID=#{projectId} AND replace(R.CHINESENAME,' ','')=#{retailerName} AND RPR.ISACTIVE=R.ISACTIVE=1

select farmer.ID id, farmer.ChineseName chineseName, farmer.Mobile mobile, farmer.OpenID openId, farmer.lastUpdateDate lastUpdateDate, farmer.area area, farmer.isActive isActive, farmer.ProvinceID provinceId from farmer left join rprojectfarmer on farmer.ID = rprojectfarmer.FarmerID where rprojectfarmer.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} and farmer.Mobile = #{Mobile} and rprojectfarmer.IsActive = 1 and farmer.isActive = 1
select rpp.ProvinceID from Promoter p inner join rpromoterprovince rpp on p.id=rpp.PromoterID and p.id=#{promoterId}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTCATEGORY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{categoryname} AND ISACTIVE=1
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTFAMILY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{familyname} AND ISACTIVE=1
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{productname} AND ISACTIVE=1

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{productname} AND PRODUCTFamilyID=( SELECT ID FROM PRODUCTFAMILY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{productfamilyname} AND CATEGROYID=( SELECT ID FROM PRODUCTCATEGORY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{categoryname} AND ISACTIVE=1) AND ISACTIVE=1) AND ISACTIVE=1

select p.* from points poi, ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{productname} AND PRODUCTFamilyID=( SELECT ID FROM PRODUCTFAMILY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{productfamilyname} AND CATEGROYID=( SELECT ID FROM PRODUCTCATEGORY WHERE replace(NAME,' ','')=#{categoryname} AND ISACTIVE=1) AND ISACTIVE=1) AND ISACTIVE=1) p WHERE POI.PROJECTID=#{projectId} AND P.ID IN (POI.PRODUCTID) AND POI.ISACTIVE=1;
SELECT MAX(ID) FROM SALERECORD WHERE IMPORTERID=#{promoterId}
SELECT MAX(ID) FROM farmersalesrecord WHERE ImporterID=#{promoterId}

select project.ID projectID, project.Name projectName, project.ProvinceID provinceID, project.PlacardPath placardPath, project.BackgroundPath backgroundPath, project.AssistantID assistantID, project.StartDate startDate, project.EndDate endDate, project.AdminID adminID, project.ID isVisible, project.IsActive isActive, project.HaveFarmer haveFarmer, project.Description description from Project where provinceID = #{provinceId} and isActive=1
select r.id retailerId,r.ChineseName retailerName,p.Name provinceName from retailer r inner join province p on r.provinceID=p.id where p.isActive=r.isActive=1
select r.id retailerId,r.ChineseName retailerName,p.Name provinceName from retailer r inner join province p on r.provinceID=p.id where r.chineseName like %#{retailerName}% and p.isActive=r.isActive=1

select r.id retailerId,r.chinesename retailername,pv.name provincename from retailer r, province pv ,project pj,rprojectretailer rpr where pj.id=#{projectId} and pj.id=rpr.projectid and rpr.retailerid=r.id and r.provinceid=pj.provinceid and r.provinceid=pv.id and pj.provinceid=pv.id and pj.isactive=rpr.isactive=r.isactive=pv.isactive=1
select * from productcategory where isActive=1
select * from PRODUCTFAMILY where isActive=1
select * from PRODUCT where isActive=1
SELECT pf.* FROM PRODUCTCATEGORY PC INNER JOIN PRODUCTFAMILY PF ON PC.ID=PF.CATEGROYID WHERE PC.NAME=#{categoryname} AND PC.ISACTIVE=PF.ISACTIVE=1
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTFAMILY PF INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON PF.ID=P.PRODUCTFAMILYID WHERE PF.NAME=#{familyname} AND PF.ISACTIVE=P.ISACTIVE=1
